summary: "Frasier" is a popular American TV sitcom that aired on NBC for 11 seasons (1993-2004). It's about Frasier Crane, a psychiatrist and radio show host who moves back to Seattle. He lives with his dad, Martin, and brother, Niles. The show also stars Peri Gilpin, Jane Leeves, and others. "Frasier" was a big hit, winning 37 Primetime Emmy Awards and is considered one of the best TV shows ever. It even got a revival in 2023 on Paramount+.
title: Frasier
